title: Yasuo Confusion?
body: Im at a Problem here, Just played a game as kassadin Versing a Yasuo and what seemed to happen was everytime he was about to use his knockup i would use my riftwalk to jump over the Whirlwind, BUT for some reason it would still knock me up and allow the Yasuo to activate his ulti even though where he was doing the animation for his ulti was no were near where i was being thrown up in the air, happened atleast 4 times, where as 2 times i flashed over his knockup and it was pefectly fine i avoided it, which is leading me to believe that Riot has changed kassadins rift walk from more of a flash to a dash this is the only conclusion i can come to as to how he was hitting me with it when i was riftwalking over it. anyone have any insight over what was happening or what the problem actually is?

replies.body: its probably to do with cast time. its probably like 0.25-0.5 second cast time, and judging by the speed of the whirlwind it would and SHOULD be nearly impossible to riftwalk over (should meaning, because its already pretty damn OP, as if kassadins constant blinks arent OP enough)
Instead of riftwalking through the whirlwind why not riftwalk away from it ?
because i want to do the damage with the riftwalk and if i riftwalk away the skirmish is over and hese come out on top with more damage the point is why am i getting knocked up?
Because your not timing it right and taking into account the fact that you can take CC for a short time while your Rift walking from your starting position.

I have now tested it with a friend and have still been unable to riftwalk over yasuo's q knockup so it had nothing to do with the possibility of me miss timing it i think either its bugged or riot has kassadins riftwalk set under a dash rather than a flash as i am unable to riftwalk over the yasuo's knockup without being hit, ive had times where ive made it over without it knocking me up but i still take damage and yasuo can still ulti yet i am still able to walk around whilst yasuo is flipping around in the air at the point where i previsously rift walked from. in my Opinion i think its a bug.

It's because Yasuo's tornado has a big radius, if you're slightly behind it you'll still be knocked up, maybe just try riftwalking out of it instead of through it, unless you have perfect timing you'll never get it.
its just like wen I was {{champion:86}} got ultid by the {{champion:90}} but I got my q of mid air even tho he ultid me mid air and it stoped him from doing his q w e r
